rooms.description: A welcoming open space that provides a smooth transition from the entrance to the interior living spaces. The design adheres to local norms and Vastu principles by ensuring the main entry is well-aligned with the West-facing plot.

A spacious living room designed as a comfortable bachelor pad area, blending contemporary aesthetics with farmhouse charm. The placement is optimized for natural light from the West-facing orientation.

Modern kitchen featuring state-of-the-art appliances and storage solutions, designed with efficiency in mind. The layout ensures easy movement between the kitchen and living areas while respecting Vastu guidelines for functional zoning.
Spacious master bedroom with ample natural light from the West-facing facade. The design incorporates privacy and comfort features suitable for a bachelor pad.

openings.description: The main entrance is positioned on the West side of the plot in accordance with Vastu principles. It provides seamless access to the interior spaces and integrates well with the overall design.

A two-car garage is designed on the ground floor, allowing easy vehicle access while maintaining a clean separation from living spaces. The garage opening ensures efficient movement and complies with local building norms.
